TopicTitle: My first part...that might be good enough for release

Articles.Content:
so i've been fiddling about with various different parts and designs in blender (none which turned out any good), and i think that i have finally come accross a model that i might actually release when its done, i would really appreciate any feedback about it and wondered if anyone had any ideas what colours i should texture it.

Basically my idea for my part that is essentially part of a moon base, although there is still a ton of work to do i thought that i would show it to everyone and find out if anyone thought that it was a good idea for a part, i am also considering making the collision mesh in such a way that you can go inside it (essentially creating an interior) although im guessing that if i do it will take a lot longer to get it ready for release.

http://imgur.com/4ZuSF

It looks very nice to me, should go great with IVA (if things ever allow for entire inside buildings)! I recommend white, with maybe solar panels Interspersed in a coherent pattern. Keep up to good work!
